title: Prestatyn dishwasher fire: Two children in hospital
article: Two children have been taken to hospital suffering from the effects of smoke after a dishwasher caught fire. North Wales Fire and Rescue Service was called to Seabank Drive in Prestatyn, Denbighshire, on Saturday at 12:20 GMT. The children's condition is not thought to be life threatening, the fire service said. Two fire crews from Rhyl and Prestatyn attended the incident, using a water jet to help tackle the blaze. The dishwasher was destroyed and the kitchen of the property suffered smoke damage, with some further damage throughout the rest of the bungalow.
